XLIX sermons upon the whole Epistle of the Apostle St. Paul to the Colossians in three parts / by ... Mr. John Daille ... Sermons. English. Selections Daillé, Jean, 1594-1670. F. S.
[8], 320, [4], 173, [3] p.
Printed by R. White, for Tho. Parkhurst, and are sold at his shop ..., London : 1672.
Reproduction of original in Cambridge University Library. On t.p.: "Translated into English by F.S." The third part has special title page and separate paging.
